game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the temple.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an ancient artifact is hidden within a forgotten temple deep in the jungle. Your quest is to locate and retrieve it.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: You must search the dense jungle for any signs of the long-lost temple.
Once inside, you'll find a chamber with runes that must be deciphered to unlock the temple's secrets.
A powerful guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to claim your reward.
